membership: RIWA Rhine is member of IAWR
goals__remit: RIWA aims to achieve a good waterquality in the rivers Meuse Rhine and Schelde by preventing harmful substances from entering the river. The quality has to be of such high quality that a natural purification is sufficient to produce perfect drinking water from it.
